content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the complex effect of this interaction contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible interpretation. Provide evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
